sn7.12:4.2: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena udayassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami.
sn7.12:4.3: Atha kho udayo brāhmaṇo bhagavato pattaṃ odanena pūresi.
sn7.12:4.4: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena udayassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn7.12:4.5: tatiyampi kho udayo brāhmaṇo bhagavato pattaṃ odanena pūretvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.12:5.1: * “Punappunañceva vapanti bījaṃ,
sn7.12:8.2: Punappunaṃ sivathikaṃ haranti;
sn7.12:8.4: Na punappunaṃ jāyati bhūripañño”ti.
sn7.12:9.1: Evaṃ vutte, udayo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.12:9.3: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
